page.title: 17A day in Gemma's life,aged 7
page.content: On Monday I get up at 8 o'clock,get dressed and go downstairs.I just have a drink of lemon juice for breakfast. Mummy makes my packed lunch and I make my drink ready for school.I go to school on a mini-bus.It takes half an hour and we pick up some other children on the way.At school I put my bag on my peg and go into class.Mrs.Lawson calls the register.We do our work and then go into Assembly,where we listen to a story and sing a song. At dinner time, hot-dinners go first then packed lunches go in.I have some sandwiches, crisps and a chocolate biscuit.After listening to a story,at half past 3,I get on the bus and go home with my friends.I change and go horse-riding. Then I have tea and go to bed at 8 o'clock.
